body:
Can you change these functions to return a Status instead of a bool?

Then, you should change the TF_CHECK_OK calls below (and elsewhere) to return an error Status instead of doing a check fail.

Also, you should change any checks like the one below where you check "data_format_pred != data_format_succ" to return a descriptive error message, rather than just false.

body_text:
Can you change these functions to return a Status instead of a bool?
Then, you should change the TF_CHECK_OK calls below (and elsewhere) to return an error Status instead of doing a check fail.
Also, you should change any checks like the one below where you check "data_format_pred != data_format_succ" to return a descriptive error message, rather than just false.
